timeline.message: [core] move c.b.s.core.attachments package to snowowl.core
[core] merge identity module into snowowl.core
[core] migrate references to identity classes

[core] merge identity.file back to snowowl.core

NOOP and FILE authentication will be the default available identity
providers supported by the core plug-in.

[core] migrate identity.ldap plugin

Convert LDAP fragment to plugin and use plug-in infrastructure to
register the plugin to the system.
[build] remove identity and identity.file from build
[build] fix reference to identity and identity.file modules

SO-3948: add new RF2 export rest API

Also, remove codeSystemShortName from RF2 export Java API and infer the
relative codesystem from the current reference branch.
Support locales String in RF2 export Java API.

SO-3948: remove produces part from export endpoint

Since the export endpoint produces two different media types
(octet_stream when the request succeeds and the file download starts and
application/json if there was a failure during the request execution) it
is necessary to remove the produces values otherwise Spring will not be
able to detect the error handler when an exception occurs.
Also, remove the Resource type from the ResponseEntity will remove the
JSON response example from the Swagger UI.
SO-3948: add more exception handlers to ControllerExceptionMapper
SO-3948: add getEffectiveTime(String, String) method to EffectiveTimes
SO-3948: use String for RF2 export start/end effectiveTimes configs
SO-3948: use new `/:path/export` endpoint in existing RF2 export tests

SO-3948: use BranchContext instead of the `referenceBranch` property...

...and the RevisionIndexRequestBuilder to support new simplified export
REST API path syntax: `/snomed-ct/v3/SNOMEDCT-UK-CL/export`.
SO-3948: update deprecated javadoc message in SnomedExportRestService

SO-3948: update SnomedRf2ImportRequest and Builder

Remove unnecessary codeSystemShortName (will be computed from the
current branch context).
Support snapshot behaviour selection in RevisionIndexRequestBuilder.
Add BranchContext alternative to Features.getImportFeatureToggle().
Add new commit() method alternatives to TransactionContext.
SO-3948: deprecate SnomedImportRestService and all `/imports` endpoints

Merge branch 'feature/single-core-module' into...

...feature/SO-3948-remove-import-export-config-objects

Conflicts:
	core/com.b2international.snowowl.core/pom.xml

	core/com.b2international.snowowl.identity.file/pom.xml

	core/com.b2international.snowowl.identity/META-INF/MANIFEST.MF
	core/com.b2international.snowowl.identity/pom.xml
	core/com.b2international.snowowl.identity/src/com/b2international/snowowl/identity/domain/Permission.java
	core/com.b2international.snowowl.identity/src/com/b2international/snowowl/identity/domain/Role.java
	snomed/com.b2international.snowowl.snomed.datastore/src/com/b2international/snowowl/snomed/datastore/request/EvaluateQueryRefSetMemberRequest.java
	snomed/com.b2international.snowowl.snomed.datastore/src/com/b2international/snowowl/snomed/datastore/request/EvaluateQueryRefSetRequest.java
	snomed/com.b2international.snowowl.snomed.datastore/src/com/b2international/snowowl/snomed/datastore/request/rf2/SnomedRf2ExportRequest.java
	snomed/com.b2international.snowowl.snomed.datastore/src/com/b2international/snowowl/snomed/datastore/request/rf2/SnomedRf2ImportRequest.java

...and core.repository

[core] moving review related classes to core.review package
[core] move compare related classes to core.compare package

[core] move branch request classes to core.branch package...

...and review request classes to core.review package
[core] move datastore.review classes to core.review package
[core] move datastore.request classes to core.request package

[core] move datastore.repository and datastore.system to...

...core.repository and core.system

[core] move datastore.file to core.attachments

Also, move datastore.index to core.repository
[core] remove unused classes

[core] move codesystem and codesystem version related classes to...

core.codesystem and core.codesystem.version
[core] move job related classes to core.jobs
[core] move OsPropertyTester to snowowl.core
[core] organize imports, fix moved class references, export packages
[core] move content availability info provider to core.repository
[core] remove snowowl.datastore plugin
[core] use FunctionalInterface for ContentAvailabilityInfoProvider
[core] depend on snowowl.core instead of datastore

SO-3948: move import config validation into SnomedRf2ImportRequest
SO-3948: remove datastore from core aggregator pom.xml

SO-3948: fix snomed.core.feature dependencies

Remove scripting.groovy reference from validation.snomed module

SO-3948: support CodeSystem lookup from a reference branch

Useful in import/export APIs where you need to create versions during
the import for the closest CodeSystem compared to the target branch.
SO-3948: remove unused XML dependencies from core.rest module
SO-3948: update launch configurations
SO-3948: use class path scanning for ScriptEngine registry init

SO-3948: use class path scanning for validation issue detail extension..

...registry init
SO-3948: remove invalid module references from dist project

SO-3948: support runaAsJob in AsyncRequest

This allows API clients to run any request as a job easily without much
boilerplate code.
Example that imports RF2 as a job using the RF2 Import Request API.
```
  SnomedRequests.rf2().prepareImport()
		.setRf2ArchiveId(rf2ArchiveId)
		.setReleaseType(Rf2ReleaseType.FULL)
		.setCreateVersions(true)
		.build("SNOMEDCT/HEAD")
		.runAsJob(importJobId, "Importing SNOMED CT RF2 file")
		.execute(bus)
		.getSync(1, TimeUnit.MINUTES);
```
SO-3948: extract SHA-1 ID generation from a unique source value to IDs
SO-3948: add CodeSystemURI.head() helper method
SO-3948: add deprecation notice to old RF2 import configuration object

SO-3948: add rf2ArchiveId, type and createVersions to JSON rep...

...of SnomedRf2ImportRequest

SO-3948: add new /:path/import endpoints

Use new endpoint in all current RF2 import test cases.

SO-3948: add new exception handlers to ControllerExceptionMapper

Use RestControllerAdvice to remove ResponseBody annotation from return
types.
Add MultipartException handler.
Add HttpRequestMethodNotSupportedException handler.
SO-3948: fix failed RF2 import API test cases
SO-3948: export core.scripts package
SO-3948: remove unused includePreReleaseContent from exporter fragments

timeline.bodyText:
This class (ConceptChangesGetRequestBuilder) is the only one in its package that hasn't been renamed to include a Review prefix and match the request class name.
Please rename it to ReviewGetConceptChangesRequestBuilder for consistency! 🙂
timeline.author: apeteri

replies.bodyText: It was on my TODO list, but forgot to do it, thanks for reminding me. 😅
replies.author: cmark

timeline.bodyText: Please indicate in the method name that it is going to be shorter than a regular SHA-1 hash.
timeline.author: apeteri

timeline.bodyText: Can we wait for the results here? What is the currently configured timeout value?
timeline.author: apeteri

replies.bodyText:
No timeout value at the moment, we wait indefinitely.
We can best guess a proper timeout value based on the selected export configuration, but not sure if that's a good idea. Not sure if we can convert this to an async method either, my guess is that Spring needs the HTTP thread to finish the file download work.
replies.author: cmark

timeline.bodyText: Please move parsing to SnomedRf2ExportRequestBuilder#doBuild, if possible, so that we know that all parameters are valid by the time the request starts.
timeline.author: apeteri

timeline.bodyText: Consider wrapping this part in a try-catch block (although not sure if we want to move forward with an import that has desynced from the CIS).
timeline.author: apeteri

replies.bodyText: Well, yeah, that's something that should not happen, otherwise duplicate content will start appearing and that's always a bad sign. The CIS registration logic has been simplified greatly to allow as much ID as possible in, so I think we are safe for now. 😄
replies.author: cmark

timeline.message:
SO-3948: rename ConceptChangesGetRequestBuilder to...

...ReviewGetConceptChangesRequestBuilder
SO-3948: convert start/end effective times during request build time

SO-3948: use dedicated method for short SHA-1 generation

Also add a full SHA-1 hash method to IDs.

SO-3948: convert start/end effective times during request build time...

...(missing bits)

SO-3948: convert jobId to jobKey

Supplied id is no longer acts as a unique key, but as a basis to
generate the unique SHA-1 key of a remote job.
This will ensure that the unique key of the job is URL safe and can be
returned safely from REST API endpoints.
Add filterByKey/filterByKeys method to SearchJobRequestBuilder.
Support 'restart' option in ScheduleJobRequests. With this option the
caller can restart (replace in fact) an already
completed/failed/canceled job with the same key easily (will eliminate a
lot of boilerplate code around clients).
SO-3948: migrate classification services to new job keys
SO-3948: migrate SNOMED CT APIs to new job keys

SO-3948: migrate validation APIs to new job keys

Also, move validation endpoints to `/snomed-ct/v3` where they actually
belong.
SO-3948: fix incorrect job ID used in progress monitor init

SO-3948: remove feature toggle support

Superseded by unique job keys and lock objects.
Add `optionalService(Class)` method to ServiceProvider.
Add `isJobRunning(String)` method to ServiceProvider.

SO-3948: support optionalService method in DelegatingContext...

...and not in all current ServiceProvider implementations
SO-3948: use Strings instead of enums for release type and refset layout
